name: Ensure AMIs Are Private
body: In order to avoid sensitive data exposure, you should not make Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) public. If required, you can share them with relevant AWS accounts without making them public.
remediationDescription: Follow the steps described in the [AWS Documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/sharingamis-explicit.html) on how to share an AMI with specific AWS accounts
